numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that students in the top 10% of parent income are more likely to be accepted into colleges.
2. I wonder whether legacy students still have an advantage.
3. I wonder whether a legacy student has an advantage even if the legacy student has a low GPA.
5. Many people in my community go to similar elite schools.
6. Many people in my community gravitate toward these elite schools.
7. The headline is: Students Acceptance Advantages Into Colleges With Parents That Have a Higher Income Rate.
